name: .SQZ File Extension
summary: Learn about .SQZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: If you still have access to it, you can open an SQZ (Squeeze Project File) in Sorenson Squeeze (Windows, Mac). If you do not have access to Squeeze, you can open your SQZ file in any text editor, to view the XML-formatted text it contains.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
